TopicTitle: Youtubbers, could you use a Space Shuttle?

Articles.Content:
Hey youtubbers, could you use a good looking and fully capable stock NASA Space Shuttle? I'm looking for a youtuber to take it up in a cinematic.

STS-1 Space Shuttle

You are welcome to use it free, unfettered, and without credit. I just want to see what people can do with it.

Edited January 26, 2015 by inigma

Huh, I was actually thinking of a cinematic that would require a launch vehicle capable of launching a few station modules into LKO, actually. So if you could provide a download link so I can download the craft, that would be awesome.

P.S: everyone else, I call dibs

Craft here:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108219-STS-1-Space-Shuttle-(NASA-Replica-Easy-to-Load-Fly)-Launch-Full-O-Y-Tanks-to-Orbit-CRAFT-UP!

- - - Updated - - -

Huh, I was actually thinking of a cinematic that would require a launch vehicle capable of launching a few station modules into LKO, actually. So if you could provide a download link so I can download the craft, that would be awesome.

P.S: everyone else, I call dibs

Awesome! Thank you! Post a link to your completed vid in the Spacecraft Exhange thread link above so I can promote it. I would be totally floored if anyone makes a vid of their own featuring the craft. The more the merrier!

STS-2 is now out. I've also published a SpaceHab module replica that flew on Columbia's last mission if you care to use. See http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108219-STS-2-Space-Shuttle-%28NASA-Replica-Easy-to-Load-Fly%29-%28Added-STS-107-SpaceHab-Subassembly!%29
STS-3 is out. Same forum link as above.
